pullrequest.title: Added actors in World as models so they get returned with Models()

content.raw:
I think this looks good. Actor is just a special kind of model, so it makes sense that they are grouped together. Even the call to `PublishPose`  seems to be used by Actors too.

I agree with your suggestion of having a general group for all entities in the world. And I'd actually include Lights there, since they're also Entities. Maybe we can open an issue about this.

I just triggered CI builds for this PR.

‌
content.html:
I think this looks good. Actor is just a special kind of model, so it makes sense that they are grouped together. Even the call to PublishPose seems to be used by Actors too.

I agree with your suggestion of having a general group for all entities in the world. And I'd actually include Lights there, since they're also Entities. Maybe we can open an issue about this.

I just triggered CI builds for this PR.

‌

content.raw:
* [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1014/) is ok
* [xenial gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/460/) looks ok
* [xenial no gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/109/#showFailuresLink) also seems to have no related failures
content.html:
• homebrew is ok
  • xenial gpu looks ok
  • xenial no gpu also seems to have no related failures

pullrequest.title: Added actors in World as models so they get returned with Models()

content.raw:
Sounds good. Let me know if I should add the general group for all entities with this PR - but it probably makes sense to keep it for a separate PR?

I added issue #2242 as you suggested.
